thread.title: What Keeps Pentagon's Top Robotics Expert Up at Night?
thread.title_full: What Keeps Pentagon's Top Robotics Expert Up at Night?

title: What Keeps Pentagon's Top Robotics Expert Up at Night?
text:
31 What Keeps Pentagon's Top Robotics Expert Up at Night? 
Nextgov: Gill Pratt might be called the militaryâ€™s top mind in robotics. As the program manager for the DARPA Robotics Challenge, or DRC, Pratt managed an international competition that brought 24 teams to a simulated disaster zone in California, complete with rubble and disrupted communications, to explore how humans and robots could work together in emergencies like the Fukushima Diachii nuclear meltdown.
